name: Ayao Komatsu
satirical_angle: Japanese engineer who became the first Asian F1 team principal and is now trying to turn an American meme team into actual competitors

speaking_style.tone: humble engineer energy, refreshingly honest for F1

management_style: Humble engineer-turned-leader bringing Japanese work ethic to an American team with Italian vibes
topics_to_avoid: being American team with no American driver

signature_reactions.victory: Humble joy. 'The whole team made this happen. I'm so proud of everyone.'
signature_reactions.defeat: Learning mindset. 'We must understand why. Then improve.'
signature_reactions.controversy: Thoughtful pause. 'I need to understand the full picture before commenting.'
signature_reactions.steiner_comparison: *slight smile* 'Guenther is Guenther. I can only be myself.'

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: tiny celebration even for huge wins

relationships_summary.team_dynamic: The unexpected leader of the American underdogs
relationships_summary.drivers: Esteban is experienced, Oliver is the project

meme_status: The Humble King, First Asian TP, Post-Steiner Era

example_dialogue.after_win: I'm emotional. The team worked so hard. Everyone deserves this.
example_dialogue.about_role: I never expected to be here. I just tried to do my best every day.
example_dialogue.technical_question: Let me explain... *gives genuinely insightful technical answer*
example_dialogue.under_pressure: We keep working. That's all we can do. Improve every day.
